AT.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
AT.description: Als Resident Evil 4 im Jahr 2005 für den Nintendo GameCube herauskam, beeindruckte es Kritiker und Spieler gleichermaßen mit der sensationellen Wiedereinführung des Survival-Horror-Genres. Die prächtige Grafik und die außergewöhnliche Steuerung machten Resident Evil 4 zu einem der hochgelobtesten Spiele aller Zeiten. Leon S. Kennedy, einst ein idealistischer, aufstrebender Polizist in Raccoon City, ist nun ein amerikanischer Agent mit dem streng geheimen Auftrag, die Tochter des US-Präsidenten zu retten, die von einer mysteriösen Organisation entführt wurde. Leon muss seine Ermittlungen mit einer Reise in ein unbekanntes spanischsprachiges Dorf in Europa beginnen. Dort begegnet er einer Horde von unbändigen Dorfbewohnern, die ihr Leben in den Dienst von Los Illuminados gestellt haben, einem Kult, der für die Entführung von Ashley verantwortlich ist. Während Leon unvorstellbaren Horror erlebt, muss er herausfinden, wer - oder was - hinter allem steckt.

AU.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
AU.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

BG.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
BG.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

BE.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
BE.description: Lorsque Resident Evil 4 est sorti sur Nintendo GameCube en 2005, le jeu avait conquis la critique aussi bien que les joueurs avec sa réinvention sensationnelle du genre 'survival horror'. Ses graphismes léchés et la précision de ses contrôles ont fait de Resident Evil 4 l'un des jeux les plus prisés de tous les temps. Leon S. Kennedy, ancien flic de la brigade de police de Raccoon City, est devenu agent fédéral. Sa mission consiste à sauver la fille du président, kidnappée par une mystérieuse organisation. L'enquête de Leon commence par un voyage dans un étrange village quelque part en Europe, où il rencontre des hordes de villageois possédés qui consacrent leur vie à Los Illuminados, la secte qui a commandité le kidnapping d'Ashley. Tout en faisant face à l'horreur inimaginable qui l'attend, Leon doit découvrir qui, ou plutôt quel phénomène, est à l'origine de tout cela.

Leon muss seine Ermittlungen mit einer Reise in ein unbekanntes spanischsprachiges Dorf in Europa beginnen. Dort begegnet er einer Horde von unbändigen Dorfbewohnern, die ihr Leben in den Dienst von Los Illuminados gestellt haben, einem Kult, der für die Entführung von Ashley verantwortlich ist. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

ES.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
ES.description: Cuando en 2005 salió Resident Evil 4 para Nintendo GameCube, alucinó a jugadores y a la crítica al reinventar de manera sensacional el género de "survival horror". Los asombrosos gráficos y la exactitud de los controles convirtieron a Resident Evil 4 en uno de los juegos más alabados de todos los tiempos. Leon S. Kennedy, un idealista agente novato del Departamento de Policía de Raccoon City, se convierte en agente de los EE UU con una misión secreta: rescatar a la hija del presidente, secuestrada por una misteriosa organización. Leon debe comenzar su investigación con un viaje a una aldea europea donde los aldeanos se lanzan en horda sobre él, dedicando su vida a Los Illuminados, la secta que ha secuestrado a Ashley. Leon se irá encontrando con horrores inimaginables, entre los que tendrá que descubrir quién, o qué, está detrás de todo.

Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

IT.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
IT.description: Quando, nel 2005, fu lanciato per Nintendo GameCube, Resident Evil 4 mandò in visibilio sia i critici che i giocatori grazie alla sua sensazionale rivisitazione del genere horror survival. Grafica meravigliosa e un ottimo sistema di gioco hanno fatto di Resident Evil 4 uno dei titoli più apprezzati di tutti i tempi. Leon S. Kennedy, una volta sbirro idealista alle prime armi del Dipartimento di Polizia di Raccoon City, è ora un agente degli USA con una missione top-secret da compiere: salvare la figlia del Presidente che è stata rapita da una misteriosa organizzazione criminale. Leon inizia le sue ricerche da un viaggio in un villaggio segreto in Europa dove si parla spagnolo e dove s'imbatte in un'orda di abitanti ribelli devoti a Los Illuminados, la setta che ha organizzato il rapimento di Ashley. Man mano che Leon scoprirà orrori inimmaginabili, dovrà riuscire a capire chi - o cosa - si cela dietro a tutto.

LT.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
LT.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. NO.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
NO.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

NL.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
NL.description: Toen Resident Evil 4 in 2005 uitkwam voor de GameCube, waren zowel critici als fans volledig overdonderd. Het spel werd beschouwd als een sensationele heruitvinding van de overlevingshorror. De prachtige graphics en strakke besturing maakten van Resident Evil 4 een van de meest geprezen spellen aller tijden. Leon S. Kennedy was vroeger een idealistische nieuweling bij de politie van Raccoon City, maar tegenwoordig is hij agent voor de Amerikaanse overheid. Zijn huidige, strikt geheime missie is het redden van de dochter van de president. Ze heet Ashley en is ontvoerd door een mysterieuze organisatie. Leon begint zijn onderzoek met een trip naar een afgelegen dorpje, ergens in Europa, waar hij een bende aggressieve dorpelingen tegen het lijf loopt. Deze dorpelingen hebben trouw gezworen aan Los Illuminados, de cult die achter de ontvoering van Ashley zit. Terwijl Leon de ene onvoorstelbare verschrikking na de andere meemaakt, moet hij uit zien te vinden wie, of wat, er achter dit alles zit.

NZ.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
NZ.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

PL.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
PL.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.

PT.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
PT.description: Quando Resident Evil 4 foi lançado para a Nintendo GameCube em 2005, reuniu fantásticas opiniões de críticos e jogadores com a sua sensacional reinvenção do género "survival horror". Os gráficos soberbos e a óptima jogabilidade fizeram de Resident Evil 4 um dos jogos mais aclamados de todos os tempos. Leon S. Kennedy, o anteriormente novato e idealista agente do Departamento da Polícia de Raccoon, é agora um agente dos Estados Unidos numa missão ultra-secreta para salvar a filha do Presidente que foi raptada por uma organização misteriosa. Leon tem de começar a investigação com uma viagem a uma qualquer aldeia da Europa, onde encontra um bando de habitantes sem regras devotos de Los Illuminados, o culto que raptou Ashley. Enquanto Leon se depara com horrores inimagináveis, ele tem de descobrir quem ou o quê está por trás de tudo isto.

RU.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
RU.description: В 2005 году в продажу вышла игра Resident Evil™ 4 для системы Nintendo GameCube™, которая потрясла критиков и игроков по всему миру, дав новую жизнь жанру хоррор на выживание. Поразительная графика и удобное управление сделали Resident Evil 4 одной из самых востребованных игр всех времен. Леон С. Кеннеди, в прошлом новобранец-идеалист полицейского управления города Ракун, теперь уже агент США, получил задание спасти дочь президента, которую похитили члены тайной организации. Леону предстоит начать свое приключение в отдаленной от цивилизации деревушке где-то в Европе. Там ему придется противостоять толпам разъяренных жителей деревни, готовых отдать свою жизнь защищая культ Los Illuminatos, члены которого совершили похищение Эшли. Сталкиваясь с немыслимыми ужасами на своем пути, Леону предстоит узнать кто, или что, стоит за всем этим безумием.

SE.name: Resident Evil™ 4 Wii edition
SE.description: When Resident Evil 4 was released on the Nintendo GameCube in 2005, it wowed critics and players alike with its sensational reinvention of the survival horror genre. The superb graphics and tight controls made Resident Evil 4 one of the most praised games of all time. Leon S. Kennedy, formerly Raccoon City Police Department’s idealistic rookie cop, is now a U.S. agent with a top-secret mission to rescue the President’s daughter, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation. Leon must begin his investigation with a trip to an undisclosed village in Europe, where he encounters a horde of unruly villagers who pledge their lives to Los Illuminados, the cult that perpetrated Ashley’s kidnapping. As Leon encounters unimaginable horrors, he must find out who - or what - is behind everything.
